name: Sudoklue
description:
Sudoklue will teach you how to solve any puzzle with step-by-step, easy to follow instructions — using absolutely no math. Input a puzzle from a newspaper or have Sudoklue create one for you, choosing from five levels of difficulty.

Bored with other Sudoku apps? Sudoklue can generate true expert-level puzzles & teach you all the solving techniques needed to solve them, step by step! With Sudoklue, puzzle and logic complexity can remain basic, or if you choose - can climb up into "pull your hair out" levels.

Features:

– Work on puzzles from any newspaper, magazine, or book
– Create your own, one of a kind puzzles
– Learn all of the primary solving techniques
– Get detailed and easy to understand hints
– Get a complete puzzle analysis and difficulty rating
– Solve any Sudoku
– Virtual pencil for making notes
– Includes full Undo/Redo
– Verify your current work with the tap of a button
– Fill all pencil marks with the tap of a button

Sudoklue will give you as much or as little help as you like. It will teach you, step by step, how to use logic to solve any puzzle you can find!
